SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob

Class LotterySampler

java.lang.Object
com.example.haboob.LotterySampler
public class LotterySampler extends Object
Helper class for handling lottery logic for events. This class manages the random selection of entrants from waiting lists, moving selected entrants to invited lists, and filling vacancies when invited entrants decline. The lottery system ensures fair random selection and automatically sends notifications to both selected and non-selected entrants. Features: - Random lottery sampling from waiting lists - Automatic notification sending to winners and non-winners - Vacancy filling when invited entrants decline - Preview sampling without modifying event data

  • Method Details

    • performLottery

      public void performLottery(Event event)
      Performs lottery sampling on an event's entrants list. Randomly selects entrants up to the event's lottery sample size and moves them to invitedEntrants. Remaining entrants are moved to waitingEntrants. The method calculates available spots by subtracting currently invited and enrolled entrants from the lottery sample size. Selected entrants are notified of their invitation, while non-selected entrants are notified they remain on the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to perform lottery sampling on
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if event is null, has no entrants, or sample size is invalid

    • sampleEntrants

      public List<String> sampleEntrants(List<String> entrants, int sampleSize)
      Performs lottery sampling and returns the selected entrant IDs without modifying the event. This method is useful for preview or testing purposes where you want to see potential lottery results without actually changing event data. The selection is random and uses shuffling to ensure fairness.
      Parameters:
      entrants - List of entrant IDs to sample from
      sampleSize - Number of entrants to select
      Returns:
      List of randomly selected entrant IDs, or empty list if parameters are invalid

    • fillVacancyFromWaitlist

      public String fillVacancyFromWaitlist(Event event)
      Fills a vacancy by selecting one entrant from the waiting list. This method is called when an invited entrant cancels their invitation, creating an available spot that can be filled from the waiting list. The selected entrant is randomly chosen, moved from waiting to invited, and automatically sent a notification about their invitation.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to fill a vacancy for
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly selected entrant, or null if no one is waiting
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if event is null
